page.title: 04 THE GIRL GUIDES
page.content: Every Tuesday night I go to Guides at Butts Lane School. Usually we play team games or have a game of rounders outside. Some nights in the summer we do treasure hunts around the village. At Easter we have egg competitions and at Christmas a fancy dress party where we play bobbing the apples. Each summer we go on a trip to Whitby by train. Most years we have a barbecue. This year we are celebrating the 75th anniversary of the founding of the Guides. Princess Ann lit a torch and it is being passed round all of the Guide groups in England and they are all lighting their anniversary cakes and having celebrations. As a Guide you can work for different badges. I have received my hostess badge and I wear it on my uniform. Being a Guide is lots of fun but we must remember the Guide Laws.
